website_description: An Information Management Tool for the AI Era
something_wrong: Some thing wrong, please try again later
init_setting_alert: You haven't completed the initialization settings yet. Please finish the setup to use all features properly.
init_setting_dialog_description: Through initialization settings, you can quickly prepare all the configurations needed to start using this product.
init_mine_model_form_needed: You must either: 1) fill in all required fields for a new provider, or 2) select an existing provider
init_file_system_form_config_needed: This file system requires configuration parameters. Please refer to the demo for setup
init_engine_form_config_needed: This engine requires configuration parameters. Please refer to the demo for setup
month_summary_description: A chart will display your document reading summary over the past month.
unread_documents_card_description: Documents you added but haven't read yet will appear here.
recent_read_documents_card_description: Your recent reading history will appear here.
dashboard_document_label_summary_tips: A pie chart will display the number of documents for each label.
notification_receive: You have received a new notification
rss_page_tips: RSS subscriptions will automatically detect source updates in the background and generate corresponding documents, while also updating the related sections. The default detection frequency is every 60 minutes.
rss_add_tips: After adding a server, Revornix will periodically (every 60 minutes by default) fetch updated pages from the feed and create corresponding documents.
rss_auto_fill_tips: The system will automatically fill in the title, description, and cover image based on your RSS link
rss_update_tips: After updating, the original scheduled crawling will stop, but already fetched documents will be retained.
rss_delete_warning: Are you sure you want to delete this? Once deleted, the feed will no longer be crawled automatically. However, previously fetched documents will be kept.
setting_notification_task_manage_delete_: Are you sure you want to delete? This action cannot be undone after the notification is deleted.
setting_notification_task_manage_form_cr: This expression refers to a Unix-style cron expression. For details, see
setting_notification_task_manage_form_en: Enabled by default. Please disable manually if needed.
setting_notification_task_manage_add_ale: The task will run immediately after being added. You can use the first execution to verify success. Note that there may be some delay. Please wait a moment before confirming.
setting_notification_task_manage_update_: The task will run immediately after being updated. You can use the first execution to verify success. Note that there may be some delay. Please wait a moment before confirming.
setting_notification_source_manage_delet: Are you sure you want to delete? Once deleted, all related notifications will not be sent.
setting_notification_source_manage_alert: You can configure notification sources here. Once configured, you can enable notifications.
setting_notification_source_manage_form_: Adding a source allows you to send notifications to various terminals. Currently, only email is supported.
Please enter the source email address
Please enter the source email password
Note: This is not your actual email password, but the SMTP service password.
Please enter the source server address
Please enter the source server port
Please enter the Team ID associated with your Apple ID
Please enter the Key ID corresponding to the certificate with APNs push permission
Please enter the content of the certificate with APNs push permission
Please enter your application's bundle ID
setting_notification_target_manage_delet: Are you sure you want to delete? Once deleted, all related notifications will not be sent.
setting_notification_target_manage_alert: You can configure notification targets here.
setting_notification_target_manage_form_: Adding a target allows notifications to be received through various channels.
setting_default_document_read_model_upda: Default Document Reading Model Updated Successfully
setting_file_system_page_current_user_fi: Please select the default file system
setting_file_system_page_alert: Data is not shared between different file systems. If you switch file systems, all files will remain in the original system by default. Please migrate files manually if needed. Creating a new file system will not affect any existing systems.
setting_file_system_page_file_system_for: Please select a file system type
Please enter the file system name
Please enter the file system description
Please enter the file system configuration
setting_file_system_page_file_system_add: Here you can add and configure a file system.
setting_file_system_page_mine_file_syste: Configure parameters for the file system {file_system} here

Are you sure you want to delete it? Once deleted, the file system will no longer be usable (data will remain inside the file system and will not be deleted; if you need to delete the data, please go to the corresponding system to delete it manually)
setting_engine_page_current_user_website: My current default website parsing engine
Please select the default website parsing engine
setting_engine_page_current_user_file_en: My current default file parsing engine
Please select the default file parsing engine
setting_engine_page_engine_add_descripti: Here you can add an engine and configure its parameters.
setting_engine_page_mine_engine_config_d: Configure the parameters of the engine {engine} here
setting_engine_page_mine_engine_delete_a: Are you sure to delete it? Once deleted, the engine will no longer be usable.
setting_engine_page_tip: Engine is just a name. In this project, it essentially refers to a plugin that parses the target product and generates markdown.
setting_default_document_parse_engine_up: Update the default markdown parse engine successfully
setting_model_provider_add_description: You can quickly add a model provider here, or use your own custom service, but note that the service must comply with the OpenAI protocol.
setting_model_provider_delete_warning_de: Once a model provider is deleted, all related model groups will also be deleted. This action is irreversible! Are you sure you want to delete?
setting_model_models_configure_descripti: Here you can configure all models available from the corresponding provider
setting_model_add_failed: Failed to create model, please try again later
setting_model_update_failed: Failed to update model, please try again later
setting_revornix_model_empty: The default model is not configured yet
setting_revornix_model_update_successful: Revornix AI Response Model Updated Successfully
hot_search_error_description: Failed to load the hot search data, please try again later
revornix_ai_default_model: Current the default llm model is
revornix_ai_model_not_set: You haven't set the default model yet, Please go to the settings page to set it up
revornix_ai_base_knowledge: Answers based on your knowledge base.
revornix_ai_history_sessions_description: Here you can view all your chat records with Revornix AI.
revornix_ai_message_placeholder: Enter the question you want to ask
revornix_ai_mcp_description: Once MCP is enabled, RevornixAI will gain the ability to use tools, but it will consume more tokens. Please use it according to your specific needs.
mcp_server_update_form_headers_placehold: Please enter MCP service request headers
mcp_server_update_form_env_placeholder: Please enter MCP script environment variables
mcp_server_create_form_headers_placehold: Please enter MCP service request headers
mcp_server_create_form_env_placeholder: Please enter MCP script environment variables
mcp_server_description: Here you can configure the MCP server. Once configured and enabled, RevornixAI will be able to use the MCP toolchain.
mcp_server_cmd_needed: In Terminal MCP mode, 'cmd' is required
mcp_server_script_needed: In Terminal MCP mode, 'script' is required
mcp_server_args_needed: In Terminal MCP mode, 'args' is required
mcp_server_url_needed: In Http MCP mode, 'url' is required
mcp_server_delete_alert_description: Once the MCP server is deleted, Revornix AI will no longer be able to access any toolchains provided by it, which will affect all subsequent requests. Are you sure you want to proceed with this operation?
search_note: Note: Vectorized search results may be inaccurate. Please filter according to your actual needs.
document_create_quick_note_description: Quickly record your ideas and transform them into knowledge.
document_create_link_engine_unset: The current link conversion engine is not set
document_create_link_engine_unset_descri: You haven't set up a link conversion engine yet. Please
before using the link document addition feature.
document_create_file_engine_unset: The current file conversion engine is not set
document_create_file_engine_unset_descri: You haven't set up a file conversion engine yet. Please
before using the file document addition feature.
document_create_link_description: Enter a link to automatically convert the page content into knowledge. Note: Only one link is supported at a time.
document_create_file_description: Upload a file to automatically analyze its type and encode it into the knowledge base. Currently supported formats include images (.jpg and .png), PDF, Word (.doc and .docx), and PowerPoint (.ppt and .pptx).
document_create_label_empty_tips: Can't find the tag you want?
document_create_ai_summary_description: When enabled, AI will automatically summarize the entire file content into a paragraph and save it in the document, as well as intelligently generate a more suitable title and description based on the file content.
document_create_ai_summary_engine_unset: Please configure the default document reader model first, otherwise the summary cannot be generated
document_create_section_choose: Please select the section to push to
section_create_form_labels_empty_tips: Can't find the tag you want?
section_create_formpublic_description: If selected as public, everyone will be able to see this section and access the related information.
section_documents_description: Here you can view all the documents associated with this article.
section_ai_tips: This article was identified by AI from a website. Please verify the information accordingly.
section_configuration_description: Here you can configure the related information and permissions for this section.
section_configuration_form_labels_empty_: Can't find the tag you want?
section_delete_alert_detail: Are you sure you want to delete this section? All subscribed users will be removed automatically! This action cannot be undone!
section_subscribe_success: Subscribed successfully. You will receive notifications when the section is updated.
section_search_filter_description: Here you can filter the document list to retrieve documents within a specific range.
section_search_filter_form_label_descrip: After selecting a tag, only sections containing that tag will be displayed. Note: After clearing, because the tag filter is empty, all sections will be hidden. You must cancel tag filtering to display all sections again.
section_not_found_description: The section you searched for does not exist. Please check if the request or URL is correct.
document_not_found_description: The document you searched for does not exist. Please check if the request or URL is correct.
document_delete_alert_description: Are you sure you want to delete this document?
ai_summary_failed_as_markdown_transform_: Detected that the current document's Markdown format failed to convert. Unable to generate summary. Please regenerate the Markdown first.
The document is currently converting to Markdown. Please try again later.
The document is still in the Markdown conversion queue. Please try again later. If it takes too long, please retry manually.
document_note_content_no_less_than: The note must be at least 5 characters long
document_notes_description: By appending notes, you can add supplementary explanations to the document or record some important information
document_notes_tips: Currently, only the document creator can edit additional notes
document_transform_to_markdown_doing: Markdown conversion is in progress. Please wait to view the Markdown. You can browse the original document first.
document_transform_to_markdown_todo_tips: Note: In rare cases, the conversion service may be interrupted. If your document remains pending for a long time, please click the button below to retry.
document_ai_tips: This article is identified from a website by AI. Please verify the information carefully.
document_search_filter_description: Here you can filter the document list to retrieve documents within a specific range.
document_search_filter_form_label_descri: After selecting a tag, only documents containing that tag will be displayed. Note: After clearing, because the tag filter is empty, all documents will be hidden. You must cancel tag filtering to display all documents again.
document_transform_again: Added to conversion queue again, please wait
account_nickname_no_less_than: Nickname must be at least one character
account_slogan_description: It will be displayed on your profile page
account_slogan_no_less_than: Personal signature must be at least one character
account_slogan_update_placeholder: Please enter your preferred personal signature
account_phone_bind_description: After binding your phone number, you can log in using your phone number and verification code
account_phone_bind_form_description: To bind your phone number, a verification code will be sent to your phone. The code must be correct to proceed with the modification.
account_email_bind_description: After binding your email, you can log in using your email and password
account_email_update_description: Note: For security reasons, after changing your bound email, your password will be forcibly changed. Please click the view button next to the password field to see your initial password after the update.
account_github_description: After binding your GitHub account, you can quickly log in with it
account_google_description: After binding your Google account, you can quickly log in with it
account_password_initial_password_descri: The initial password can only be viewed once. Please make sure to save it.
account_password_update_form_password_no: Password must be at least 8 characters
account_password_description: You can log in using your email and password
account_api_key_description: Unlock personalized platform capabilities through your API Key
account_api_key_add_description: Please enter a description for the API Key
account_api_key_delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete this API Key? Note: Once deleted, all requests based on this API Key will be taken offline.
account_delete_alert: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
account_delete_alert_description: Once deleted, all your account information will be permanently erased. This action cannot be undone!
follows_empty: You haven't followed anyone yet. Start publishing sections to gain popularity!
fans_empty: You don't have any fans yet. Start publishing sections to attract attention!
user_slogan_empty: This user has no signature yet
seo_login_password_no_less_than: Password must be at least 8 characters
seo_login_description: Enter your email and password to log into your account
seo_register_description: Enter the required information to complete registration
seo_register_password_no_less_than: Password must be at least 8 characters
seo_register_password_again_different: The two passwords do not match
